== Main inclusion report for libsoup2.0 ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libs/libsoup2.0, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' New build dependency of `gtkhtml3.0` which is scheduled for main inclusion.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No executables.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: no Debian showstopper bugs, however, seems to be undermaintained in Debian.
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian policy met.

MartinPitt: approved
